name: City S11
description:
City S11 is currently suffering from serious air, water pollution, hygiene problems, and more. Citizens are feeling very insecure and unhappy about the current environment. The city needs your help to become sustainable again! 

Look around the polluted world, indicate places that can be improved, learn how different structures would have different effects on the city and community. See how you can transform the world into a beautiful and happy world!
